column4: ErrorDescription:Spill some while filling the mug.)
column5: (StepDescription: Fill-Fill a microwave-safe mug with skimmed milk)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Fill-Fill a microwave-safe mug with skimmed milk and spill some.)']

column5: (StepDescription: Add-Add 1 teaspoon of white sugar to the mug)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Add-Add 1 tablespoon of white sugar to the mug.)']

column4: ErrorDescription:Microwaving for less than a minutes.)
column5: (StepDescription: Microwave-Microwave the contents of the mug for 1 minute)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Microwave-Microwave the contents of the mug for 45 seconds.)']

column5: (StepDescription: Add-Add 1/5 teaspoon cinnamon to the mug)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon to the mug.)']

column4: ErrorDescription:Not mixing the contents of the mug thoroughly.)
column5: (StepDescription: Mix-Mix the contents of the mug)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Mix-Mix the contents of the mug only once.)']

column4: ErrorDescription:Adding only one piece instead of two.)
column5: (StepDescription: Add-Add 2 pieces of chocolate to the mug)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Add-Add 1 piece of chocolate to the mug.)']

column5: (StepDescription: Heat-Heat the contents of the mug for 1 minute and serve)
column6: (StepModifiedDescription: Heat-Heat the contents of the mug for 1 minute and serve)']
